project.name: |-- 003-strategy
project.description:
Keywords: + Functional Programming, Java 8 + Strategy Design Pattern
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates how to implement the Strategy pattern using lambdas.
ValidationRunner: In the example, a ValidationStrategy interface is defined, along with a Validator that includes this strategy as a field.
Then, we demonstrate the old-school approach when using the strategy (define classes that implement the strategy) and also how to use the strategy using lambdas, which improves the readability of the solution.
